page.title: 18THE VILLAGE VOICE OF OFFLEY.
page.content: THE VILLAGE VOICE is the monthly magazine which is distributed to every household in the villages of Offley and Lilley.This magazine is delivered free and contains information about forthcoming events,reviews of past events, letters of thanks and various articles.Each month one of the local clergy write an article which has some moral or spiritual content;the other articles are frequently on rural topics.Occasionally there are controversial articles to do with local politics,or the late delivery of this free paper! In no way can this small village be considered a rural backwater as there is a great deal of input from the outside world;many residents work in different parts of the country some travelling the world.At school 'World News is part of the curriculum.
